author: vors
body:
In the spirit of keeping our documentation great, we should include section "releasing" in CONTRIBUTING.md.

For example, see https://github.com/github/linguist/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#releasing

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I can do the Linux side of this. Also get the Gemfile added etc. It's pretty smooth.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: You know, I'd really like automated releases. Uploading from Travis and AppVeyor through GitHub's API when a `vX.X.X` tag is pushed is definitely doable.

title: CONTRIBUTING.md needs a "releasing" section
